code: import{API_ENDPOINT}from"../Util/Constraint";import AxiosService from"../Util/AxiosService";var studentUrl='/api/student';export var enrollCourses=function enrollCourses(courseIds){var formData=new FormData();formData.append('courseIds',JSON.stringify(courseIds));return AxiosService.post(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+'/enrollCourse',formData);};export var unenrollCourses=function unenrollCourses(courseIds){var formData=new FormData();formData.append('courseIds',JSON.stringify(courseIds));return AxiosService.post(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+'/unenrollCourse',formData);};export var getStudentInfo=function getStudentInfo(){return AxiosService.get(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+'/studentInfo');};export var addStudent=function addStudent(StudentDTO){return AxiosService.post(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+'/admin/addStudent',StudentDTO);};export var removeStudent=function removeStudent(id){return AxiosService.delete(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+'/admin/removeStudent/'+id);};export var getAllStudents=function getAllStudents(){return AxiosService.get(API_ENDPOINT+studentUrl+"/admin/getAllStudents");};
